summary: Mobile-first navigation update: replace permanent left sidebar with a collapsible full-width drawer opened via a hamburger icon, with semi-transparent scrim and auto-close behaviors; drawer remains collapsible on all screen sizes.
architectural_notes: Navigation drawer behavior decisions: collapsible on all screen sizes; full-width drawer on mobile; semi-transparent scrim behind open drawer; close on outside tap, close icon, or navigation selection.

existing_features.title: Update the global AppShell layout to replace the permanent left sidebar with a mobile-first collapsible drawer that is hidden by default on all screen sizes and opened via a hamburger menu icon in the top-left of a persistent header/top bar.

Implement the drawer interaction behaviors: tapping the hamburger opens a full-width left-side overlay drawer; the drawer includes a close (X) control; tapping outside the drawer (on the scrim) closes it; selecting any navigation menu item navigates and automatically closes the drawer.

Ensure the main content area uses the full available width when the drawer is closed, and ensure drawer/scrim layering (z-index/positioning) does not cause overlap glitches or prevent main content scrolling when the drawer is closed.

new_feature_requests.summary: Replace permanent left sidebar with a mobile-friendly collapsible drawer: hamburger icon on all main screens; sidebar hidden by default; full-width slide-in overlay from left with semi-transparent scrim; close on outside tap, close icon, or menu selection; main content expands to full width; drawer remains collapsible on all screen sizes.

projectName: Convert permanent sidebar into collapsible full-width drawer with hamburger menu and scrim
